### http://GetLighthouse.com | Lead Front End Engineer / Designer | San Francisco, CA | full time | ONSITE

Employees quit managers, not companies. If you've ever worked at a dysfunctional, hyper-growth startup, or a big company wrecked by politics, you've experienced how bad management can make work miserable. It’s crazy managers aren’t given more help. We're changing that by helping with the fundamentals of good management through software.

We have a functioning product with hundreds of paying customers, and want to bring great design and experience to our validated and growing MVP. We’re looking for someone to take the lead on making Lighthouse a world-class product.

### You:

If you’ve been building your skills for years on product teams and are looking for the chance to take the drivers seat on the direction of a product from design through implementation, this is the perfect role for you (with the big equity to match). You’ll have the chance to bring all your skills together as part of a team that’s customer driven and excited to make more people love their jobs.

You’re a fit for this role if you...

-> Take great pride in your work and obsess over getting the details right

-> Always look for places to simplify, whether that’s removing a button, or making 30 lines of code work with 5.

-> You love using funnels & analytics, as well as talking to customers, to ensure what you design & build is right.

### Tech stack currently includes: Rails, Capistrano, html/scss, bootstrap, jQuery, Postgres, Stripe, GCal API

* Interested in the role? Email Jason at GetLighthouse dot com mentioning Hacker News in the subject line. Please, no recent code school grads.
